quote_last: , every toilet on Merit Street suddenly exploded in a geyser of shit and raw sewage as some unimaginable reversal took place in the pipes which fed the holding tanks of the new waste-treatment plant in the Barrens.
title: IT
author: Stephen King

quote_first: According to the Book of Revelation, the great beast's number is 666. So that exact time would be
quote_last: on the sixth of the sixth, sixty-six. Double whammy.
title: A Dog Called Demolition
author: Robert Rankin
